good question gigolo.  Tbh I wrote out a huge wall of text telling people what DC++ was and how to use it...I guess it was too long of a comment and it would not let me post it :(

I know people don't care much about the copyright for comics but I don't use a vpn and I don't hide my connection so uploading is out of the question.  I've already had super bad luck with copyright assholes in my time, so I'm not iso more lol.

Anyway google DC++ gig0l0 and install it.  Then register to the comic book hubs, it's easy as shit.  I'd rather educate people about this, then they can get any comic they want if a situation like this arises again.  If your too lazy, then that's on you.  The Copyright trolls don't regulate DC++ anymore that is why it's so great to use, and especially for comics because they are such small file sizes.

If anyone wants an "idiot proof" guide to install and use DC++ for comics and everything else just let me know and give me your email or something.  I have 2 terabytes of comics from DC++...quite the collection heh.  

But ya sorry, I don't upload torrents anymore because I got bent over by the copyright trolls.  I suppose I could use a free VPN to upload torrents...the connections are real slow though and it takes forever :(
